titleInfo.title: Arbitrarily varying channels with states sequence known to the sender

mods.abstract: The capacity of the arbitrarily varying channels with states sequence known to the sender is determined. The result is obtained with the help of an elimination technique and a robustification technique. It demonstrates once more the power of these techniques.

originInfo.publisher: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE)
